News

27 August 2020
Prof.Chiranjib Bhattacharyya takes charge as the Chair of CSA Department

9 January 2020
Prof.Chiranjib Bhattacharyya is organising FATE ML workshop . This workshop on Fairness, Accountability, Transparency and Ethics in Machine Learning is organised in collaboration with IISc, LinkedIn and Microsoft Research

9 January 2020
Paper titled ‘Finding a latent k–simplex in O* (k·nnz(data)) time via Subset Smoothing’ by Prof.Chiranjib Bhattacharyya and Ravindran Kannan published in SODA

30 June 2019
Prof.Chiranjib Bhattacharyya is collaborating with Tata Motors in the domain of artificial intelligence and computer vision

3 November 2019 (Cancelled!)
<a href=’https://people.eecs.berkeley.edu/~jordan/’‘>Prof.Michael I. Jordan</a> will deliver a talk as part of Frontier Lecture series on 7th Nov at 10 AM at IISc Faculty Hall

25 October 2019
Prof.Chiranjib Bhattacharyya is organising Deep Tech Entrepreneurship in an ongoing effort to bring together alumni, faculty, students of IISc, with the broader entrepreneurial ecosystem of deep technology companies.

6 September 2019
Pooja Ravi Kulkarni is selected for the Computer Science of India Society Bangalore Medal for Best M.Tech Student 2018. She was advised by Prof.Chiranjib Bhattacharyya

9 January 2019
Joint workshop by IISc, Microsoft Research, and U. Pennsylvania on Programming Languages, Formal Methods, and Cyber-Physical Systems, Jan. 10th 2019, in Department of CSA.

11 December 2018
Shikhar Vashishth, advised by Prof.Partha Talukdar and Prof.Chiranjib Bhattacharyya, is awarded Google PhD Fellowship.

6 August 2018
Abhishek Bansal received the Computer Science of India Society Bangalore Medal for Best M.Tech Student, 2017. He was advised by Prof.Chiranjib Bhattacharyya

23 January 2018
The paper titled Using Inherent Structures to design Lean 2-layer RBMs, by Abhishek Bansal (IBM India Pvt Ltd), Abhinav Anand (Indian Institute of Science), Prof.Chiranjib Bhattacharyya (Indian Institute of Science), has been accepted at ICML 2018

23 January 2016
Prof.Chiranjib Bhattacharyya co-chairs a special task group on machine intelligence set by Karnataka Knowledge Commission

We are part of the Computer Science and Automation at Indian Institute of Science.
